definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: curse (As. arâru Zim:BP 68; on relation of mngs. bind & curse in As. v. Dl:Pr 101)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְאָרוֹתִ֫י]], [[אָרוֹתִיהָ]] Mal 2:2; Impf. 2 ms. [[תָּאׂר]] Ex 22:27, Nu 22:6, Nu 22:12; [[אָאׂר]] Ge 12:3; Imv. [[אָ֫רָה־]] Nu 22:6, Nu 23:7; [[אוֹרוּ]], [[אׂרוּ]] & Inf. abs. [[אָרוֹר]] all Ju Jdg 5:23; Pt. [[אׂרֲרֵי]] Job 3:8; [[אׂרֲרֶיךָ]] Ge 27:29, Nu 24:9; [[אָרוּר]] Ge 3:14 + 36 t. etc.;—curse ‖[[בֵּרֵח]] bless, chiefly in poetic & legal sources of JED & later imitations: Ge 12:3, Ge 27:29 (J) Nu 22:6, Nu 22:12, Nu 23:7, Nu 24:9 (E) Ex 22:27 (E) Mal 2:2; [[אׂרוּ אָרוֹר ישְׁבֶיהָ]] = curse for ever her inhabitants Ju Jdg 5:23; [[אׂרֲרֵי יוֹם]] cursers of the day (magicians whose imprecations made days unlucky) Job 3:8. Pt. pass. [[אָרוּר]], chiefly as exclamation, ‖[[בָּרוּח]] Ge 3:14, Ge 3:17, Ge 4:11, Ge 9:25, Ge 27:29, Ge 49:7, Nu 22:12, Nu 24:9 (E, poet.) De 27:15–26, Ju Jdg 21:18, 1Sa 14:24, 1Sa 14:28, 1Sa 26:29, Je 11:3, Je 17:5, Je 20:14, Je 20:15, Je 48:10, Je 48:10, Mal 1:14; [[אֲרוּרִים הַשּׁׂגִים מִמִּחְוֹתֶיךָ]] cursed be those who wander from thy commands Ps 119:21 (LXX SyrVer Jer De Ri), [[הָאֲרוּרָה הַזּאׁת]] this cursed woman 2Ki 9:34. †

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: 3 ms. sf. [[אֵרֲרָהּ]] curse, lay under a curse Ge 5:29 (J); Pt. [[הַמַּיִם הַמְאָרֲרִים]] the curse-bringing waters Nu 5:18–27 (P 6 t. waters destroying the perjured adulteress drinking them). †
